text: Senate Republicans block bipartisan border package, then scramble to find support for Ukraine aid  —  Wartime aid for Ukraine was left hanging in the Senate Wednesday after Republicans blocked a bipartisan border package that had been tied to the funding, then struggled to coalesce around a plan to salvage the aid for Kyiv.
